product.name: Banana
product.description: Freshly picked from floridian banana tree. They are a good source of vitamins and energy.

product.name: Apple
product.description: Freshly picked from local orchard. They are a good source of vitamins and energy.

product.name: Cheerios
product.description: Enjoy a box of Cheerios with your family. This flavour filled cereal is sure to be a hit with everyone.

product.name: Cornflakes
product.description: Corn flakes are a healthy choice for any balanced breakfast. With no artifical sweeteners, these low fat and gluten free flakes are perfect for anyone.

product.name: Crunchy Cheetos
product.description: Enjoy the cheesy crunch of Crunchy Cheetos!

product.name: Doritos Wasabi
product.description: Enjoy the sweet and spicy flavour of Doritos Wasabi!

product.name: FrootLoops
product.description: This family sized box of Froot Loops is a must for families. This cereal is part of a nutritious breakfast, made with whole grain and no articial flavours.

product.name: Grapes
product.description: Freshly picked from local grape farm. They are a good source of vitamins and energy.

product.name: Oatmeal
product.description: A great source of Carbohydrates, these oats will cook in 1.5 minutes, making them perfect for a quick breakfast or snack.

product.name: Runts
product.description: Enjoy the sweet taste of Runts!

product.name: Skittles
product.description: Enjoy the sweet taste of Rainbow Skittles!

product.name: Beef Cubes
product.description: When you shop at Tomas' and Friends Grocery you know you're not only getting groceries. You're getting our legendary service and you're encouraging local business owners. That's right, most of our products come from local farmers and producers so that we can give you, and your family, the freshest food possible.
